root.name: Wings of Prey
root.description: OverviewWings of Prey is an aerial combat simulator that takes place during World War II. The player doesn't assume the role of any famous or well known pilot, but instead, of an aerialist recruit.GameplayGameplay involves battles over large, open environments set during six major WWII engagements including: The Battle of Britain, Stalingrad, Ardennes, Berlin, Sicily, and Korsun. Over 40 historically accurate aircraft are featured, and all have unique design advantages to fit specific playing styles. Realistic Eastern and Western European environments are portrayed in stunning quality due to Gaijin Entertainment's environmental engine. After completing the 50 campaign missions in both arcade and realistic modes, players can ready-up into WOP's multiplayer mode and face off against 32 opponents in 4 multiplayer variants: Team Battle, Dog Fight (FFA), Strike, and Capture the Point.
